channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
this is my current jdk and i have this on my compiler....
@echo off title Galkons Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause....
when i double click on compiler it says this......
Error occurred during initialization of VM java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: error in opening JAR file C:\Program Fi a\jdk1.6.0_17\jre\lib\rt.jar at java.lang.String.<init>(String.java:178) at java.io.Win32FileSystem.resolve(Win32FileSystem.java:241) at java.io.File.<init>(File.java:269) at sun.jkernel.DownloadManager.getBundlePath(DownloadManager.java at sun.jkernel.DownloadManager$2.run(DownloadManager.java:165) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.jkernel.DownloadManager.<clinit>(DownloadManager.java:155) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1630) at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:823) at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1028) at java.lang.System.initializeSystemClass(System.java:1086)
Press any key to continue . . .
and when i hit save then double click on compiler it says this ....

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

this is my current jdk and i have this on my compiler…

@echo off
title Galkons Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause…

when i double click on compiler it says this…

Error occurred during initialization of VM
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: error in opening JAR file C:\Program Fi
a\jdk1.6.0_17\jre\lib\rt.jar
at java.lang.String.(String.java:178)
at java.io.Win32FileSystem.resolve(Win32FileSystem.java:241)
at java.io.File.(File.java:269)
at sun.jkernel.DownloadManager.getBundlePath(DownloadManager.java
at sun.jkernel.DownloadManager$2.run(DownloadManager.java:165)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at sun.jkernel.DownloadManager.(DownloadManager.java:155)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1630)
at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:823)
at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1028)
at java.lang.System.initializeSystemClass(System.java:1086)

Press any key to continue . . .

and when i hit save then double click on compiler it says this …
